languages.text:
Империум зиждется на беспрекословном подчинении Лекс Империалис, и проктор Соломон Антар — непреклонный служитель Адептус Арбитес, что хранят этот священный порядок. Вместе с верным кибермастифом Глейто он вершит правосудие без жалости и сомнений, собирая с миров десятину, питающую мощь Империума, и вынося приговоры преступникам.
В свиту Вольного Торговца Соломона привел союз между арбитрами Простора и династией фон Валанциус, и близится час, когда принципы проктора подвергнутся заключительному испытанию.

The Imperium is founded on unquestioning obedience to the Lex Imperialis, and Proctor Solomorne Anthar is a steadfast servant of the Adeptus Arbites who upholds this sacred order. Together with his faithful cyber-mastiff Glaito, he administers justice without pity or doubt, collecting from many worlds the tithe that feeds the might of the Imperium, and passing sentence on criminals.
Solomorne has been brought into the retinue of the Rogue Trader by an alliance between the Arbitrators of the Expanse and the von Valancius dynasty, and the hour is approaching when the Proctor's principles will be put to the ultimate test.
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
Das Imperium basiert auf bedingungslosem Gehorsam gegenüber dem Lex Imperia, und Proktor Solomorne Anthar ist ein aufrechter Diener der Adeptus Arbites und befolgt diesen heiligen Befehl. Zusammen mit seinem treuen Cyber-Mastiff Glaito sorgt er ohne Gnade oder Zweifel für Gerechtigkeit. Er treibt auf vielen Welten den Zehnt ein, der die Macht des Imperiums aufrecht erhält, und bestraft Verbrecher.
Solomorne ist durch ein Bündnis zwischen den Arbitratoren der Ausdehnung und der Dynastie Valancius in das Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}gelangt, und es naht die Stunde, in der die Prinzipien des Proktors auf die ultimative Probe gestellt werden.
languages.original_text:
The Imperium is founded on unquestioning obedience to the Lex Imperialis, and Proctor Solomorne Anthar is a steadfast servant of the Adeptus Arbites who upholds this sacred order. languages.text:
L'Imperium repose sur l'obéissance absolue à la Lex Imperialis. Le proctor Solomorne Anthar est un serviteur indéfectible de l'Adeptus Arbites et défend cet ordre sacré. Avec Glaito, son fidèle cyber-mastiff, il fait régner la justice sans doute ni clémence. Il parcourt d'innombrables mondes pour récolter la dîme qui alimente l'Imperium et pour juger les criminels.
Après une alliance entre les arbitrators des Étendues et la dynastie von Valancius, Solomorne a rejoint l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Ses principes de proctor seront bientôt mis à rude épreuve...
languages.original_text:
The Imperium is founded on unquestioning obedience to the Lex Imperialis, and Proctor Solomorne Anthar is a steadfast servant of the Adeptus Arbites who upholds this sacred order. Together with his faithful cyber-mastiff Glaito, he administers justice without pity or doubt, collecting from many worlds the tithe that feeds the might of the Imperium, and passing sentence on criminals.
Solomorne has been brought into the retinue of the Rogue Trader by an alliance between the Arbitrators of the Expanse and the von Valancius dynasty, and the hour is approaching when the Proctor's principles will be put to the ultimate test.

languages.text:
人类帝国建立在对帝国法典的绝对服从之上。帝国法务部负责维护神圣的律法，而索罗蒙·安萨监察官是帝国法务部坚定不移的仆人。他与他忠实的生化獒犬格雷托一起行动，毫不犹豫地执行律法，没有一丝怜悯之心。他负责从众多世界征收什一税，供养帝国的有生力量，同时对罪犯下达判决。
由于科罗努斯扩区法务部与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝之间的盟约，索罗蒙加入了行商浪人的随行人员队伍。在这场旅途中，这位监察官的行事准则将会遭受前所未有的考验。
languages.original_text:
The Imperium is founded on unquestioning obedience to the Lex Imperialis, and Proctor Solomorne Anthar is a steadfast servant of the Adeptus Arbites who upholds this sacred order. Together with his faithful cyber-mastiff Glaito, he administers justice without pity or doubt, collecting from many worlds the tithe that feeds the might of the Imperium, and passing sentence on criminals.
Solomorne has been brought into the retinue of the Rogue Trader by an alliance between the Arbitrators of the Expanse and the von Valancius dynasty, and the hour is approaching when the Proctor's principles will be put to the ultimate test.

traits.locale_text:
人类帝国建立在对帝国法典的绝对服从之上。帝国法务部负责维护神圣的律法，而索罗蒙·安萨监察官是帝国法务部坚定不移的仆人。他与他忠实的生化獒犬格雷托一起行动，毫不犹豫地执行律法，没有一丝怜悯之心。他负责从众多世界征收什一税，供养帝国的有生力量，同时对罪犯下达判决。

languages.text:
El Imperium se cimienta en la obediencia incuestionable a la Lex Imperialis, y el Procurador Solomorne Anthar, como sirviente fiel del Adeptus Arbites, mantiene este orden sagrado. Junto con su leal cibermastín, Glaito, reparte justicia sin compasión ni duda, recolectando en muchos mundos el diezmo que alimenta la fuerza del Imperium y dictando sentencia contra los criminales.
Solomorne se ha unido al séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente mediante la alianza entre los Arbitrator de la Extensión y la dinastía von Valancius, y se acerca el momento en el que se pondrán a prueba los principios del Procurador.
languages.original_text:
The Imperium is founded on unquestioning obedience to the Lex Imperialis, and Proctor Solomorne Anthar is a steadfast servant of the Adeptus Arbites who upholds this sacred order. Together with his faithful cyber-mastiff Glaito, he administers justice without pity or doubt, collecting from many worlds the tithe that feeds the might of the Imperium, and passing sentence on criminals.
Solomorne has been brought into the retinue of the Rogue Trader by an alliance between the Arbitrators of the Expanse and the von Valancius dynasty, and the hour is approaching when the Proctor's principles will be put to the ultimate test.

languages.text:
帝国はレックス・インペリアへの絶対的な服従を基に築かれており、ソロモーン・アンサール代理人はこの神聖な秩序を維持する高等裁定局の忠実な僕である。忠実なサイバーマスチフ「グライト」と共に、彼は憐れみも疑いもなく正義を執行し、多くの惑星から帝国の力を養うのに租税を徴収し、犯罪者に判決を下している。
ソロモーンは、エクスパンスのアービトレイターとフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の同盟によりローグトレーダーの従者に加わったが、代理人の信念が究極の試練に晒されようとしている。
languages.original_text:
The Imperium is founded on unquestioning obedience to the Lex Imperialis, and Proctor Solomorne Anthar is a steadfast servant of the Adeptus Arbites who upholds this sacred order. Together with his faithful cyber-mastiff Glaito, he administers justice without pity or doubt, collecting from many worlds the tithe that feeds the might of the Imperium, and passing sentence on criminals.
Solomorne has been brought into the retinue of the Rogue Trader by an alliance between the Arbitrators of the Expanse and the von Valancius dynasty, and the hour is approaching when the Proctor's principles will be put to the ultimate test.

languages.text: İmparatorluk, Lex İmperialis'e sorgusuz sualsiz itaat üzerine kuruludur ve Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar da bu kutsal düzeni ayakta tutan Adeptus Arbites'in sadık bir hizmetkârıdır. Kendisi, sadık siber mastifi Glaito ile birlikte bir an bile merhamet ve şüphe duymadan adaleti sağlamakla birlikte birçok dünyadan aşar toplar ve suçlulara hüküm verir. Solomorne, Enginlik'in Yargıcıları ile von Valancius hanedanlığı arasındaki ittifak neticesinde Hür Tacir'in maiyetine alınmıştır ve Üsteğmen'in prensiplerinin nihai sınava tabi tutulacağı o an yaklaşmaktadır.
languages.original_text:
The Imperium is founded on unquestioning obedience to the Lex Imperialis, and Proctor Solomorne Anthar is a steadfast servant of the Adeptus Arbites who upholds this sacred order. Together with his faithful cyber-mastiff Glaito, he administers justice without pity or doubt, collecting from many worlds the tithe that feeds the might of the Imperium, and passing sentence on criminals.
Solomorne has been brought into the retinue of the Rogue Trader by an alliance between the Arbitrators of the Expanse and the von Valancius dynasty, and the hour is approaching when the Proctor's principles will be put to the ultimate test.
